## gcloud.CloudRunProps.allowUnauthenticated property

Allow public access to this service

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allowUnauthenticated: boolean;
```

## Remarks

If set to `true`<!-- -->, the service will be public. Otherwise, authentication will be required to access the service from outside the project.
